text: Amapa may refer to: *Amapá, one of the states of Brazil **Amapá (municipality), a municipality in that Brazilian state *Amapa, Nayarit, a town in the Mexican state of Nayarit *Amapa morada, common name for the tree Handroanthus impetiginosus, in the family Bignoniaceae, which ranges from northern Mexico to Argentina *Amapa, common name for the tree Parahancornia fasciculata, in the family Apocynaceae, from the Amazon rainforest
title: Amapa
